data.name: Dino Crisis 2 Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Get your adrenaline pumping with the breakbeats and ominous tones of 2000 survival horror classic Dino Crisis 2! Includes bonus electro and guitar remixes.

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
